title: Northern Trust's Profit, Revenue Increase
text:
By Allison Prang

Northern Trust Corp.'s (NTRS) earnings increased as revenue rose, mainly from higher trust, investment and other service fees.

Profit at Northern Trust was $384.6 million, up 2.7% from the comparable quarter a year earlier. Earnings were $1.69 a share, up from $1.58 a share. Analysts polled by FactSet were expecting $1.64 a share.

Revenue was $1.55 billion, up 4.1%. Analysts were expecting $1.52 billion.

Trust, investment and other service fees were $975.5 million, up 3.9%. Assets under custody/administration and those under custody and under management all increased.

Write to Allison Prang at allison.prang@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 23, 2019 07:57 ET (11:57 GMT)
